颬字的基本解释

颬
xiā
〔颬颬〕ａ．开口吐气的样子；ｂ．风声，如“寒风带雪吹颬颬。”

颬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiā］
［《廣韻》許加切，平麻，曉。］
见“颬颬”。

颬字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【風字部】　颬； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1411第24
【廣韻】許加切【集韻】虛加切，?音煆。【廣韻】風貌。　又開口吐氣貌。【張衡·西京賦】含利颬颬，化爲仙車。【註】含利，獸名，性吐金言。初爲獸，後化爲仙人車，乃以驪馬駕之。【字彙】譌爲山車，非。

颬字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
颬字的起名意思

暂无。

Shao
Basic explanation of words
Shao
xiā
[颬颬] a. The appearance of exhaling; b. The sound of the wind, such as "The cold wind brings the snow to the furry."
Shao
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [xiā]
["Guangyun" Xu Jiaqie, Pingma, Xiao. ]
See "颬颬".
Shao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Feng Zi Department】　颬; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 1411-24
[Guang Yun] Xu Jiaqie [Ji Yun] False and cut,? The sound is fragrant. [Guangyun] style and appearance.　Exhale again. [Zhang Heng·Xijing Fu] It contains good graces and turns into a fairy car. [Note] Containing profit, animal name, sexual utterance. At first it was a beast, and then it turned into a fairy car, which was driven by a horse. 【Vocabulary】Jiao is a roller car, not.
